details.sectionContent: This workshop will be aimed at teaching students the basic tenents of industrial automation

Industrial automation is the use of control systems, such as computers or robots, and information technologies for handling different processes and machineries in an industry to replace a human being. It is the second step beyond mechanization in the scope of industrialization.

Participants are required to come with their laptops.
Topics to be covered in this workshop:
‣	Concept of industrial automation
‣	Design of automation circuit
‣	Control board design
‣	Basic computer programming
‣	Troubleshooting errors
‣	On the spot demonstration of Pneumatic and control system from laptops of the participants.
‣	Understanding of sensors and control units
